entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfo: Support SSD and HDD for DriveType #98675
  • Ensure VN doesn't try to fold relocatable handles #98673
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Unknown reloc type 260 when replaying with -applyDiff #98666
    9.0.0
  • Set ProducesNetCoreAssets property in Publishing.props #98662
  • NativeAOT compile error #98659
  • MetadataLoadContext: Custom attribute enum argument parsing fails for non-core System.Enum-derived type because IsEnum is false #98658
  • [browser][MT] Configure `pthreadPoolInitialSize` and `pthreadPoolInitialSize` in WebAssembly SDK #98652
    9.0.0
  • [mono] set alc collectible #98649
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.2.24113.6] SharpScss.dll causes application crash when converting scss to css #98646
  • AOT之后的软件怎么暴漏一些参数给vmp软件,让vmp自动选择加密的函数 #98645

Closed

  • .NET 8: Non-Breaking Space Being Added in DateTime & TimeOnly ToString Calls on Linux #98664
  • [NativeAOT/arm32] punning test failure in Checked build #98493
  • Start-up performance degradation of.NET 8 in Amazon Linux 2023 over Amazon Linux 2 #96740
  • JsonPropertyName is not inherited from abstract property #98663
  • [browser] Validate that browser template debugging works #95627
    9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.CountersTest.Basic_Counters "Category does not exist" #78194
  • [8.0] Failing to build native components #94823
    8.0.x
  • on AOT with Intercepter, Reflection(GetValue) for Virtual Property of zero value causes crush. #96611
    9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Crash in interpreter delegate wrapper when calling AOT:ed virtual delegate target method in mixed mode. #92466
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #98595
  • WriteAllLinesAsync can throw IOException synchronously somehow #98564
    9.0.0
  • aot #98644

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Add null checks into memcpy/memset helpers" #98681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Wrong IEquatable<T?> interface #98680
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] cleanup cwraps #98679
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix GC boundaries #98678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98677
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Expanded & clarified BerConverter tests #98676
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [browser][MT] cleanup #98672
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_SWITCH #98671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect cref's in MetricsBuilderExtensions #98670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Disable building Swift interop tests on macOS with Native AOT #98667
    os-mac-os-x, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Propagate DotNetBuildOrchestrator #98660
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add a unified mechanism to track metadata/metrics about the compilation #98653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve Half conversion test coverage #98642
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix bug in arm64 LazyMachState unwind #98635
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove FluentAssertions reference from ILCompiler.Trimming.Tests.csproj #98674
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #98610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Remove unnecessary assertion from emitOutputInstr #98484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prevent incorrect constant folding #98561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable Swift interop tests on macOS with Native AOT #98651
    os-mac-os-x, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #98563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] pre-load threads early in dotnet.js #98637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSType.OneWay -> JSType.DiscardNoWait #98647
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add alpine support in install-native-deps script #98603
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] New jiterpreter backbranch scan pass #98530
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Set setFrameRequired like the other archs #98535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Ensure file-opening exceptions emerge asynchronously from File.Append/WriteAllLinesAsync #98612
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 121.0.6167.184, windows: 121.0.6167.185 #98624
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] try to fix "Invalid atomic access index" - more #98640
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Expand String.EndsWith/MemoryExtensions.EndsWith in JIT #98593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter: Do not generate relocations within .debug_info for DW_AT_type #98597
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement projection tooling for simple P/Invoke void cases #2517

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create an MSBuild Task that package authors can use to verify that a .NET Tool is able to be invoked #38883
  • Fix dotnet template install logic! don't uninstall the current version when the new version does not exist! #38868
  • Translation Error #38867

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] With .NET 9 alpha SDK installed, installing android workload or workload restore failed with error. #38095

PullRequests

Created

  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #38882
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix unbalanced quote in error message #38881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #7949

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Document outline in VS2022 17.4 - font too small #72172
  • CS9210 regression in .NET 8.0.200 SDK #72170
  • Missing opportunity for a collection expression in a value tuple #72169
  • `IIncrementalGenerator` doesn't output file if class inherits from class in separate project #72167

Closed

  • dotnet 8.0.200 breaking change - wrong exception is thrown when rethrow in a catch inside another catch using async methods #72141
  • `RazorSourceGenerator` failed to initialize when building ASP.NET/Razor project in VS 17.10 Preview 1 #72139

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken link #72173
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Support UnscopedRef attribute on interface methods and properties #72171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Update SDK to 8.0.201 #72168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractRecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider.GetSymbolsAsync #72157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup handling of flags in internal syntax nodes. #72130
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.SelectAs* methods #72159
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge Lock object feature to main #72137
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputSelect with int values does not populate on validation error and doesn't work as expected. #54127
  • Please add support for constants for @page directive #54126
  • Perf regression: fortunes #54125
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, updates #54124
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, single_query #54123
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #54122
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54121
  • [Blazor] Enhance form and data-permanent is not enough control. #54117
  • Add `AddHubOptions<>` SignalR extension to `IServiceCollection` #54116
  • Blazor server exception while running locally #54111
  • EditForm in foreach loop not working without rendermode InteractiveServer #54108
  • Disable hot reload script from frontend #54107

Closed

  • Blazor generic component with CascadingParameter does not update displayed value, even when the value changes in code #54063
  • New Blazor App w/ Individual Auth does not compile #54118
  • Real multithreading in Blazor WebAssembly #17730
    9.0-preview2
  • How to publish on Azure .NET 8 Blazor Web App with Interactive Auto on CLI? #53329
  • Input of thousand separators are accepted in NumericUpdown components even if ThousandsSeparator is false #54114
  • ASP Net 6 does not work correctly on IIS #53788
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54102
  • Controls are not working properly in.NET 8.0 Web App Per Page (interactive location) template layout pages. #53925

PullRequests

Created

  • Improved Server Addresses Collection Debugging #54120
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #54119
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24116.21 #54110
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54062
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Infrastructure tweaks for unified build #54081
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • [main] Improve Blazor project template #54048
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui iOS WebView - MauiWKWebView DidFinishNavigation not called. #20713
  • CollectionView with ItemsSource Binding is not currently being Garbage Collected #20710
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when beeing bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #20706
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected #20703
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerException at MauiAppCompatActivity.dispatchTouchEvent -crash #20698
  • [.NET 9 Hot Restart] - Cant build and debug MAUI application on iOS #20697
  • FlyoutHeader on iOS does not change it's size after adding new content #20696
    Backlog
  • [testing] Run Windows UITests with new .net sdk #20692
    Backlog
  • [Potential Regression] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged app crash #20690
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Grid with custom MauiScrollview control and handler has wrong z index and changes when overscrolling #20689
    Backlog
  • [Android][MAUI-8.0.7] The CPU always maintains around 20%, even without any operation #20684
    Backlog

Closed

  • MenuBarItem Commands not working on Mac Catalyst #20685
    Backlog
  • Optimizing Assemblies for size limit #20490
  • VScode Maui Code build error #20680
  • EnableLLVM make Application Crash #20665
  • A possible use case for contentRootRelativePath being overridable #20405
  • iOS: CollectionView - Horizontal CollectionView does not show the last element under some conditions #15815
    .NET 8 SR3
  • using C/C++ library for iOS in maui project #20688
  • Could not find workload 'ios' extended by workload 'maui-ios' in manifest 'microsoft.net.sdk.maui' #20686
  • WorkloadManifestCompositionException while pairing Visual Studio to mac agent #20687

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
  • [net8.0] Update xharness #20712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20708
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add Helpers to aide Debugging MSBuild tasks #20695
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • [main] Update to stable iOS and Android workloads #20576
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move entry related input view device tests to appium #20670
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry
  • [Catalyst] Fix Selectors for Menus #20699
    platform/macOS 🍏, control-menubar
  • [net9.0] Enable parallel builds back #20704
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove dotnet-format run for net7 branch #20702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove weird comment/copy&paste error #20693
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Fix test related issues #20639
    area/testing

Updated

  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [C] Parent Background Brush to propagate changes #20637
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Change activity attributes #20653
    platform/android 🤖
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area/Maps🗺
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568

  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069

  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to include in depth #33123
  • An issue with EF Core Recursive Updates on Unchanged Entities across Different DbContext Instances #33122
  • ExecuteDelete fails on entity configured to use table splitting #33121
  • InvalidCastException when using Proxies on two different subclasses from the same class with the same id value (TPC strategy). Am I doing something wrong? #33120

Closed

  • Consolidate Migrations #33118
  • Add IncludeAll Method with Recursion Level for IQueryable #33116
